page.title: 07SHOPS AND SERVICES
page.content: For a place as small as{PUDDLETOWN} there are a considerable number of shops and services. There are two village stores.They sell just about everything from foodstuffs and other household items to toys,alcohol and cigarettes.They attempt to attract local custom by offering weekly bargains but they have great difficulty in competing with the larger shops in{DORCHESTER,BLANDFORD and{POOLE}where most weekly shopping is done.A mobile shop tours the local area supplying small villages and farmsteads. Other shops in the village include a{butchers,clothes shop,hairdressers {and a post office.}This shop offers the usual postal services plus sweets, drinks,cards and so on.There are two postal colections and two deliveries on weekdays and one on Saturdays.
